peril.controllers

Class GameHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • peril.controllers.GameHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameController

    public final class GameHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameController
    This controller handles all interactions between the View and Game. This realises GameController.
    Since:
    2018-03-04
    Version:
    1.01.04
    Author:
    Joshua_Eddy
    See Also:
    GameController

      The instance of the Game that this GameHandler uses.

      Checks whether the continents ruler ship has changed.
